mapper.insert: insert logtable( id, date, title, content, category_id, number, likes )values( #{id}, #{date}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category_id}, #{number}, #{likes} )
mapper.select: select * from logtable left join category on logtable.category_id=category.id
mapper.update: update logtable set likes=likes+1 where id=#{id}
update logtable set number=number+1 where id=#{id}
